title: S4 Ep13: State v. Greg Lance – Episode 7 – Hurry Up and Wait
itunes:title: State v. Greg Lance – Episode 7 – Hurry Up and Wait
description: October 21, 2019 / Greg wanted more than anything to get to his trial, the speedy trial guaranteed by the Constitution, but instead he found not much in the legal system was what he thought it was supposed to be. Greg was in prison for 18 months before his trial even began.
itunes:author: Undisclosed
